CustomField.formula:
IF ( ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Subtype__c , 'Short Form') , HYPERLINK("apex/APT_GenerateOperationalSchedule?parentId=" &Id &"&templateID="+ $Label.APT_ShortFormTemplateID +"&docFormat=DOC", IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create1", "Create"),"_self"),
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Subtype__c , 'Long Form'), ISPICKVAL( Term__c , 'Open Ended')), HYPERLINK("apex/APT_GenerateOperationalSchedule?parentId=" &Id &"&templateID="+ $Label.APT_LongFormOEOSID +"&docFormat=DOC", IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create1", "Create"),"_self"),
IF(AND(ISPICKVAL( Apttus__Subtype__c , 'Long Form'), ISPICKVAL( Term__c , 'Fixed Term')), HYPERLINK("apex/APT_GenerateOperationalSchedule?parentId=" &Id &"&templateID="+ $Label.APT_LongFormFTOSID +"&docFormat=DOC", IMAGE("/resource/APT_Create1", "Create"),"_self"), null) )
)
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Generates Detailed OS in MS Word
CustomField.label: Detailed Operational Schedule (DOS)
